/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, their facades painted in different hues, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. Cars of various colors are scattered along the street, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a serene backdrop to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm, inviting light.
